## Summary

Describe what changed and why.

## Type of Change

- [ ] Bug fix
- [ ] New feature
- [ ] Refactor
- [ ] Documentation
- [ ] CI/Tooling

## Validation

- [ ] `cargo fmt --all -- --check`
- [ ] `cargo clippy --all-targets --all-features -- -D warnings`
- [ ] `cargo test --all-targets --all-features`
- [ ] `cargo check --examples`

## Compatibility

- [ ] Public API unchanged
- [ ] Public API changed (documented in README/CHANGELOG)

## Checklist

- [ ] Updated tests for behavior changes
- [ ] Updated docs for user-facing changes
- [ ] Updated changelog if needed
